channelConnected(ChannelHandlerContext, ChannelStateEvent) - Method in class com.alexkasko.netty.ftp.FtpServerHandler
com.alexkasko.netty.ftp - package com.alexkasko.netty.ftp
 
CrlfStringDecoder - Class in com.alexkasko.netty.ftp
FrameDecoder implementation, that accumulates input strings until \r\n and sends accumulated string upstream.
CrlfStringDecoder() - Constructor for class com.alexkasko.netty.ftp.CrlfStringDecoder
Constructor, uses 256 max string length and UTF-8 encoding
CrlfStringDecoder(int, String) - Constructor for class com.alexkasko.netty.ftp.CrlfStringDecoder
Constructor

D

DataReceiver - Interface in com.alexkasko.netty.ftp
Implementation should read all required data from provided FTP file-upload stream, stream will be closed immediately after #receive(String, java.io.InputStream) call
decode(ChannelHandlerContext, Channel, ChannelBuffer) - Method in class com.alexkasko.netty.ftp.CrlfStringDecoder

exceptionCaught(ChannelHandlerContext, ExceptionEvent) - Method in class com.alexkasko.netty.ftp.FtpServerHandler

FtpServerHandler - Class in com.alexkasko.netty.ftp
Netty handler, partial implementation of RFC 959 "File Transfer Protocol (FTP)" for receiving FTP files.
FtpServerHandler(DataReceiver) - Constructor for class com.alexkasko.netty.ftp.FtpServerHandler
Constructor for FTP active mode

Constructor for FTP passive mode

Constructor for FTP passive mode
